articles.content:

articles.title: COVID-19 surges in Umatilla County | Coronavirus - East Oregonian
articles.description: UMATILLA COUNTY — Umatilla County is quickly becoming the epicenter of the coronavirus pandemic in rural Oregon.

UMATILLA COUNTY Umatilla County is quickly becoming the epicenter of the coronavirus pandemic in rural Oregon.

articles.title: Plasma therapy could be ‘liquid gold’ for COVID-19 treatment - Atlanta Journal Constitution
articles.description: Domenico Piccininni is alive. It shouldn’t be taken lightly.
articles.content:
Domenico Piccininni is alive. It shouldn’t be taken lightly.
The 50-year-old DeKalb County resident’s health was in question several weeks ago. He had COVID-19.
